contents.content: _{When any ruin value crosses its threshold, subtract the threshold and increment the penalty.}
_{Increase one ruin threshold by 2, and reduce that ruin penalty to 0.}

contents.label: [b]_{Absent}[/b]: _{-1 to all checks; 1d4 unrest each turn; +2 control DC}

contents.content: _{Claim Hex bonus twice per Kingdom turn}
_{Claim Hex bonus twice per Kingdom turn}
_{Claim Hex bonus three times per Kingdom turn}
_{Claim Hex bonus three times per Kingdom turn}
_{PCs enjoy a Fine standard of living at no cost anywhere settled in the kingdom.}
_{Craft or Earn Income anywhere in the kingdom.}
_{Craft or Earn Income anywhere in the kingdom.}
_{PCs enjoy an Exotic standard of living at no cost anywhere settled in the kingdom.}
_{Craft or Earn Income anywhere in the kingdom.}
_{Craft or Earn Income anywhere in the kingdom.}
_{Each Kingdom turn, one settlement can attempt two Civic activities.}
_{Ignore the first Unrest or Ruin increase each kingdom turn.}
_{Ignore further Unrest or Ruin increases at the cost of a Fame or Infamy point.}
_{Increase the kingdom's level by 1 and subtract 1000 XP.}
_{The kingdom's level cannot exceed the party's level.}
_{Add class features from your class advancement table.}
_{At levels 5, 10, 15 and 20, boost 4 different ability scores. Increase by 1 if the score is already 18 or above, or 2 if not.}
_{At select levels, increase proficiency in one skill.}

defs.critical_failure: _{do not assign new leader this turn}

contents.content: _{If a leader was unable to spend 1 week this month, either skip one kingdom activity or apply the absence penalty}
_{If unrest is above 10, add 1d10 to ruins, distributed as you choose. Also, roll DC 11 flat check or lose one hex.}
_{If unrest is above 20, kingdom falls into anarchy. Can only Quell Unrest, and all checks are one step worse.}
